name: Dungeon64
description:
Dungeon64 strives for the appeal of raw dungeon crawling with engaging combat, traditional first-person exploration, and high-level strategy.  Developed for LowRezJam 2018.

The game places an emphasis on exploring, finding secrets, and reflexes.

How to Fight

Combat uses a 3x3 grid controlled with your number pad.  Connect the white to red dots to deal damage, with longer lines dealing more damage.  Chaining certain length attacks will invoke Skills, which deal more damage than the sum of the lines.  You can check which skills are available by going into the menu outside of combat by pressing F1.

How to Explore

Exploration is your run of the mill first-person dungeon crawling experience.  You can move forward and backward, and turn left and right.  Collect as much loot as you can find and make your way to the end of the dungeon.  You can navigate with the number pad and pick up keys, items, and open doors by pressing enter.

Hint: If you ever get lost, follow the red grass

What if I don't have a number pad?

The entire game also features key mappings for qwerty style keyboard layouts along WASD and Spacebar.  Use this as a way to navigate and fight.
